Add GeneScoreMatrix to Arrows/ArchRProject

addGeneScoreMatrix.Rd

This function for each sample will independently compute counts for each tile per cell and then infer gene activity scores.

addGeneScoreMatrix(input = NULL, genes = ifelse(inherits(input,
  "ArchRProject"), getGenes(input), NULL),
  geneModel = "max(exp(-abs(x)/5000), exp(-1))",
  matrixName = "GeneScoreMatrix", upstream = c(5000, 1e+05),
  downstream = c(5000, 1e+05), tileSize = 500, ceiling = 4,
  useGeneBoundaries = TRUE, scaleTo = 10000, excludeChr = c("chrY",
  "chrM"), blacklist = ifelse(inherits(input, "ArchRProject"),
  getBlacklist(input), NULL), threads = 1, parallelParam = NULL,
  force = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

input

An ArchRProject object or character vector of ArrowFiles.
genes

A GRanges of all genes coordinates start to end (stranded).
geneModel

A gene model function (function of x describing stranded distance from gene promoter f(x)) as a string for weighting peaks for gene score calculation.
matrixName

The name to be used for storage of the gene activity score matrix in the provided ArchRProject or ArrowFiles.
upstream

The number of basepairs upstream of the transcription start site to consider for gene activity score calculation.
downstream

The number of basepairs downstream of the transcription start site to consider for gene activity score calculation.
tileSize

The size of the tiles used for binning counts prior to gene activity score calculation.
ceiling

The maximum counts per tile allowed. This is used to prevent large biases in tile counts.
useGeneBoundaries

A boolean value indicating whether gene boundaries should be employed during gene activity score calculation. Gene boundaries refers to the process of preventing tiles from contributing to the gene score of a given gene if there is a second gene's transcription start site between the tile and the gene of interest.
scaleTo

A numeric value indicating what to scale the computed geneScores to across all cells.
excludeChr

A character vector containing the seqnames of the chromosomes that should be excluded from this analysis.
blacklist

A GRanges object containing genomic regions to blacklist for geneScore biases.
threads

The number of threads to be used for parallel computing.
parallelParam

A list of parameters to be passed for biocparallel/batchtools parallel computing.
force

A boolean value indicating whether to force the matrix indicated by matrixName to be overwritten if it already exist in the given ArrowFiles.

Contents

  • Arguments

Developed by Jeffrey Granja, Ryan Corces.
